tswitem.name: Signet of Unceasing
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Unceasing
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever an attack penetrates or critically hits you for more than 700 damage, you are instantly healed for 5%/10%/15% of that damage. This Signet can be attached to Minor Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
